title: Ticket #1724: MyType/TargetType are corrupted when matching offline ads
description:
Commit [16016] slightly broke the merging of update ads in the collector. MyType and TargetType were no longer immune to being updated in the merge.

This problem was observed when matching offline ads. The negotiator sends an update ad without bothering to set MyType or TargetType. The result was that the offline ad got these attributes set to "(unknown type)".
check_ins:
2010-Oct-20 14:05   Check-in [25740]: Documented fix for MyType/TargetType in offline ads. #1724 (By Dan Bradley )
2010-Oct-20 12:59   Check-in [19190]: Fixed corruption of MyType/TargetType when merging update ads. #1724 These attributes were getting set to "(unknown type)" due to changes that were made for new ClassAds. Also added AuthenticatedIdentity to the list of things that should not be touched when merging update ads. (By Dan Bradley )
creator: danb
